$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/history
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/history.text:
!! Revision 2.0.0 beta 2 
<<<
* Date: [20th Sep 2019]
* [NEW] new image macros, new image CSS
* [NEW] new hover class for table-hover
* all image alignment default value changed to none
* [NEW] bootstrap clearfix class was added
* [FIXED] table classes for colorful header have been rewritten to use some of contextual classes
** class `centered` renamed to `center`
* [FIXED] alerts documentation improved
* [FIXED] images documentation improved
* [FIXED] tables documentation improved
* [FIXED] badges documentation improved
* [FIXED] text-utilities documentation improved
* [NEW] Advanced examples added, documentation in progress
<<<

!! Revision 2.0.0 beta 1 
<<<
* Date: [16th Sep 2019]
* Shiraz 2 a new rewrite of Shiraz 1.0.2
<<<

!! Revision 1.0.2 
<<<
* Date: [8th Nov 2018]
* New demo for making Table of Contents
* New macros: details, abbr, hspace
* Change name to Shiraz
<<<

!! Revision 1.0.1 
<<<
* Date: [1st Nov 2018]
* A rewrite and cleanup the code
<<<

!! Revision 1.0.0
<<<
* Date: [5th Oct 2018]
* New favorites plugin
* New timestamp plugin
* New notebook tiddler
<<<

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts.text:
\define alert(type:"primary" text:"", width:"100%", class:"")
$text$
\end \define alert-leftbar(type:"primary" text:"", width:"100%")
$text$
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge.text: \define badge(type:"primary" text:"") $text$ \end \define badge-pill(type:"primary" text:"") $text$ \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card.text:
\define card(header:"Empty", title:"Empty" subtitle:"Empty" text:"Empty",footer:"Empty", width:"" class:"")
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__header__>> >
$header$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__subtitle__>> >
$subtitle$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
<<__text__>>
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >
$footer$
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ba.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-basic
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ba.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ba.text: \define image-basic(img, width:"30%", align:"none", caption:"", tooltip:"", alt:"") \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ca.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-card
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ca.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ca.text:
\define image-card(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", pos:"top", alt:"") <$reveal tag="div" type="match" default="top" text=<<__pos__>> > <$macrocall $name=image-card-top img=<<__img__>> title=<<__title__>> text=<<__text__>> footer=<<__footer__>> width=<<__width__>> align=<<__align__>> alt=<<__alt__>> /> <$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="top" text=<<__pos__>> > <$macrocall $name=image-card-bottom img=<<__img__>> title=<<__title__>> text=<<__text__>> footer=<<__footer__>> width=<<__width__>> align=<<__align__>> alt=<<__alt__>> /> \end \define image-card-top(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", alt:"")
<$image class="card-img-top" source=<<__img__>> alt=<<__alt__>> />
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
$text$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >

$footer$

\end \define image-card-bottom(img, width:"30%", align:"none", title:"Empty", text:"Empty", footer:"Empty", alt:"")
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__title__>> >
$title$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__text__>> >
$text$
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" default="Empty" text=<<__footer__>> >

$footer$

<$image class="card-img-bottom" source=<<__img__>> alt=<<__alt__>> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ov.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-overlay
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ov.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ov.text:
\define image-overlay(img, width:"30%", align:"none", caption:"", title:"", text:"", fadein:"left", alt:"")

$caption$

<$image class="image-overlay-content-image" source=<<__img__>> alt=<<__alt__>>/> <$set name="fdcls" filter="$fadein$ +[splitbefore[ ]] +[addprefix[image-overlay-fadeIn-]]">
> >

$title$

$text$

\end \define _cls-content-details() image-overlay-content-details $(fdcls)$

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-po.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-polaroid
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-po.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-po.text: \define image-polaroid(img, width:"30%", align:"none", caption:"", tooltip:"", alt:"") \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-pr.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-pretty
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-pr.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-pr.text: \define image-pretty(img, width:"30%", align:"none", caption:"", tooltip:"", alt:"") \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-sl.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-slidein
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-sl.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-sl.text: \define image-slidein(img, width:"30%", align:"none", caption:"", tooltip:"", slidein:"left", alt:"") \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/text-uti.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/text-utility
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/text-uti.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/text-uti.text: \define tc(text:"", color:"red") $text$ \define bc(text:"", color:"yellow") $text$ \define mono(text:"") $text$

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/utility.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/utility
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/utility.creator: Mohammad
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/utility.text:
\define vspace(height)

\end \define hspace(width) \end !! Utility macros This tiddler contains the user defined macros. Edit to see the code. |table-borderless|k |''vspace(height)'' |create a vertical space using an empty paragraph | |''hspace(width)'' |create horizontal space using an empty span |

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/readme.text:
Shiraz is a small framework inclusing stylesheets and macros to create stylish contents in Tiddlywiki. It has modified CSS classes from Bootstrap 4.1.3. Shiraz has customized elements like alerts, cards, panels, images, tables, badges, texts, ...

For tutorial and download see

https://kookma.github.io/Shiraz/
